activities: LexisNexis CounselLink, operating through LexisNexis Examen Inc, will be accessing or receiving personal information from the EU and Switzerland in the course of doing business. Those business activities primarily relate to providing web based access that allow businesses and other entities to manage information.
corpofftitle1: General Counsel Intellectual Property, Privacy and Governance
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: We adhere to AICPA Generally Accepted Privacy Principles and we also have a self-regulatory privacy program in place that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
